metadata.title: USN-6568-1 -- ClamAV update
metadata.description: The ClamAV package was updated to a new upstream version to remain compatible with signature database downloads.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6568-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libclamav-dev - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav-testfiles - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav-base - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav-daemon - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav-milter - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav-docs - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamav-freshclam - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 libclamav9 - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 clamdscan - 0.103.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required
